FunctionLevelAnalysis.balanceOf: Retrieves the token balance of a specified address.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.allowance: Checks the amount a spender is allowed to withdraw from the ownerâ€™s account.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.transfer: Transfers tokens from the sender's address to another address after checking balance sufficiency.
